price: 115. Waxaana dhab ahaan la galnay ballan Aadam mar hore23, wuuse illoobay, kamana aanu helin go’aan adag.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَهِدۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَنَسِيَ وَلَمۡ نَجِدۡ لَهُۥ عَزۡمٗا
footnotes: 23. Waxaa axdigaa lagu xusay Suuradda 2 Al-Baqara : Aayadda 35, wuxuuna Allaah halkan ku xusay inaan laga helin Aadam go’aan adag si uu uga hortago fidnada shaydaanka.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿahid'nā ilā ādama min qablu fanasiya walam najid lahu ʿazman
